Schedule of Annual Events
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Schedule of Annual Events
By locke on Friday, May 5, 2000 - 05:15 pm:

This might be considered a spoiler- read at your own risk!


Invitations usually occur 1 month before the event.
Ima vs Fimba Events usually occur every 4 years from the time you first get
invited. At least initially, your monster must be at the ranch to receive the
invitation.

LEGEND: Week | Class | Title | Type | # Monsters | Purse | Prize


Calendar of Events
Jan
1
2CTorble University CupRnd Robin43000G
BSirius Cup Rnd Robin44000G
3
4FNew Year Cup Free-For-All-Elimination84000G


Feb
(Expedition - Rovest to the Torles Mountains - Items are Big Footstep, Strong Glue, Fire Stone, Pure Silver, Pure Gold, Paroxodine. Chips are Mocchi, Arrowhead, Monol, Mock, Plant, and Tiger.)
1
2DTorles TourneyElimination41000GDisc Chips (Plant)
BPoannka Cup Rnd Robin45000GDisc Chips(Hopper)
SGreatest 4 Rnd Robin 410000G(Must be invited)
3EBlizzard Cup Rnd Robin41000GDisc Chips (Naga)
CKawrea Cup Rnd Robin43000GDisc Chips (Gaboo)
4AInvitational 1 VS 1 2 6000G Double-Edged

(Must be B rank or better and have Old Sheath to get invited to invitational; Double-Edged gets you a Durahan used as a secret seasoning. Does not occur every year.)


Mar
1DParepare Cup (Spring)Rnd Robin42000GMagic Banana
2CTroron Cup Rnd Robin42000G Troron
3
4EIMa Official Cup (E) Rnd Robin6500G
DIMa Official Cup (D) Rnd Robin61000G
CIMa Official Cup (C) Rnd Robin82000G
BIMa Official Cup (B) Rnd Robin83000G

APhoenix Cup Elimination44000G
4BSpring Carnival (B)Elimination43000GDisc Chips (Ape)
SLegend Cup 1 vs 1 210000G (Must be invited)


May
1AIMa Chairman Cup (Spring) Elimination 43000GDino's Tail
2CColart Cup Round Robin43000G
SM-1 Grand Prix Round Robin410000G(Must be invited)
3EBlue Sky Cup Round Robin41000G
ATaurus Cup Round Robin 45000G Taurus' Horn
4DGemini Cup Round Robin 42000GGemini's Pot

(Upgrades to the House and Barn are offered this week if you qualify)

Jun
(Dr. Talico asks you to the Kawrea Expedition. Items are Fire Feather, Joker's Mask, Pure Gold, Pure Silver, Dino's Tail, Larox, and God's Slate. Chips are Phoenix, Ducken, Joker, Pixie, Undine, Niton, Mock, Wracky, Metalner, Golem, Centaur and Baku.)
1
2FFreshmen's Cup Elimination ?8000G(beginners only)
FElder's Cup Elimination Free-For-All 88000GSilver Peach

(Note - Your monster must be at least 6 years 3 months to get Elders Cup)
(Freshmen's Cup and Elders Cup are never both available at the same time.)
3
4EIMa Official Cup (E) Round Robin6500G
DIMa Official Cup (D) Round Robin61000G
CIMa Official Cup (C) Round Robin82000G
BIMa Official Cup (B) Round Robin83000G
AIMa Official Cup (A) Round Robin84000G
SIMa Official Cup (S) Round Robin85000G

1
2DNageel Cup Round Robin42000GNageel
CCrab Cup Round Robin43000GCrab's Claw

(For Captainship of the IMA team-not available every year)


Aug
1CTorble Sea Cup Round Robin43000GStar Prune
2DDesert Moon Cup Elimination41000GDisc Chips (Kato's)

3EMonster Pups' Cup Round Robin41000GDisc Chips (Hare's)
BSummer Carnival Elimination43000GDisc Chips (Pixie)
4S/BIMa - FIMBA Meet 5 vs 5102000G



Sep
If 8th rank or higher, and it's a clear night, Aliens may come. They will visit on a total of 3 different occasions. On the 3rd visit, you get the key to Metalners)
1ATelomeann Cup Round Robin44000G Telomeann
2EArtemis Cup Round Robin41000GSculpture
BManseitan Cup Round Robin43000GManseitan

4EIMa Official Cup (E)Round Robin6500G
DIMa Official Cup (D)Round Robin61000G
CIMa Official Cup (C)Round Robin62000G
BIMa Official Cup (B)Round Robin63000G
AIMa Official Cup (A)Round Robin64000G
SIMa Official Cup (S)Round Robin65000G



Oct
(Kavaro invites you to the Parepare Expedition. Items are Old Sheath, Golden Peach, Pure Silver, and Larox. Chips are Golem, Zuum, Pixie, Gali, Ghost, Ape, Undine, Dragon, Baku, Tiger, and Color Pandora.)
1
2ERookie Cup Elimination4800GDisc Chips (Tiger)
CKasseitan Cup Round Robin42000GKasseitan
BPapas' Cup (Autumn) Round Robin44000GPure Silver
3
4AllHeroes' Cup Free-For-All8500GHero Badge

(Heroes Cup won't show for lower level monsters. If your monster is bad-natured, this will get you the Heel badge. If your monster is neutral, neither the Heroes nor the Heels cup shows up. )

1

SIMa Official Cup (S) Round Robin65000G

I deliberately stayed vague on 'how to'. That information can be looked up once you know what question you're asking. This is just an event framework with a few annotations. I use it mainly to plan training, or when to get items needed for my next step in the game. I hope you find it useful!

*****

Note from Lisa: I have turned off the ability to reply to this calendar. If you have any additions or corrections, email them to me or any or the Moderators.
